trans-unit.source: Provides a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: 提供了一系列<xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfiguration.Providers%2A> property of the <xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfiguration> class is a ProtectedConfigurationProviderCollection collection of all protected-configuration providers available to your application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfiguration.Providers%2A>属性<xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfiguration>类是所有受保护配置提供程序可供你的应用程序的 ProtectedConfigurationProviderCollection 集合。</xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfiguration> </xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfiguration.Providers%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can encrypt sections of a configuration file to protect sensitive information used by your application.
trans-unit.target: 你可以加密配置文件，以保护应用程序使用的敏感信息部分。

trans-unit.source: This improves security by making unauthorized access difficult, even if an attacker gains access to your configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 这提高了安全性进行未经授权的访问难以进行，即使攻击者可以访问你的配置文件。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework includes two protected configuration providers that can be used to encrypt sections of a configuration file: the <xref:System.Configuration.RsaProtectedConfigurationProvider> class, which uses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider> class to encrypt configuration sections, and the <xref:System.Configuration.DpapiProtectedConfigurationProvider> class, which uses the Windows Data Protection API (DPAPI) to encrypt configuration sections.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 包括两个受保护的配置提供程序可以用于加密配置文件的各节︰<xref:System.Configuration.RsaProtectedConfigurationProvider>类，它使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider>类来加密配置节和<xref:System.Configuration.DpapiProtectedConfigurationProvider>类，该类使用 Windows 数据保护 API (DPAPI) 来加密配置节。</xref:System.Configuration.DpapiProtectedConfigurationProvider> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider> </xref:System.Configuration.RsaProtectedConfigurationProvider>

trans-unit.source: You might have a requirement to encrypt sensitive information using an algorithm other than the RSA or DPAPI providers.
trans-unit.target: 你可能需要使用一种算法以外的 RSA 或 DPAPI 提供程序的敏感信息进行加密。

trans-unit.source: In this case, you can build your own custom protected-configuration provider.
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，你可以构建你自己的自定义受保护配置提供程序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider> class is an abstract base class that you must inherit from to create your own protected-configuration provider.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider>类是一个抽象基类，则必须从创建你自己的受保护配置提供程序。</xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider>

trans-unit.source: For more information about protected configuration, see [Encrypting Configuration Information Using Protected Configuration](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关受保护的配置的详细信息，请参阅[加密配置信息使用受保护的配置](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProviderCollection"></xref> class using default settings.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProviderCollection"></xref>类使用默认设置。

trans-unit.source: The ProtectedConfigurationProviderCollection constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: ProtectedConfigurationProviderCollection 构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system.
trans-unit.target: 它是由 ASP.NET 配置系统调用的。

trans-unit.source: You obtain an instance of the <xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProviderCollection> class by using the <xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfiguration.Providers%2A> property of the <xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfiguration> class.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProviderCollection>使用<xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfiguration.Providers%2A>属性的<xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfiguration>类</xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfiguration></xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfiguration.Providers%2A>的类</xref:System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProviderCollection>的实例

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider"></xref> object to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 将添加<xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider"></xref>到集合的对象。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider"></xref> object to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider"> </xref>要添加到集合对象。

trans-unit.source: provider is .
trans-unit.target: provideris .

trans-unit.source: provider is not a object.
trans-unit.target: provider不是对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider"></xref> object in the collection with the specified name.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider"></xref>集合中具有指定名称的对象。

trans-unit.source: The name of a <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider"></xref> object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: 名称<xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider"></xref>集合中的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider"></xref> object with the specified name, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there is no object with that name.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Configuration.ProtectedConfigurationProvider"> </xref>对象具有指定名称，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果没有具有该名称的对象。
